DOC.brief_summary: Musculoskeletal disorder frequent among office worker especially neck/shoulder area . The hypothesis , specific strength training neck/shoulder muscle alleviate pain . The two sub-hypotheses 1 . Alleviation pain independent training frequency 2 . Alleviation pain high follow supervised train vs train initial instruction
DOC.brief_title: Work Place Adjusted Intelligent Physical Exercise Reducing Musculoskeletal Pain Shoulder Neck
DOC.detailed_description: Recent study show positive effect work site physical exercise intervention , however , lack evidence regarding : 1 ) extend instruction supervision , 2 ) frequency train session wek . Questionnaires send around 2000 office worker invite participate work site train 1 hr per week 20 week . Those accept invitation randomize 5 different group : 1. train 1 hr one time per week supervized 50 % time 2. training 3 x 20 min per week supervise 50 % time 3. training 3 x 20 min per week supervise initially careful instruction 4. train 10 x 6 min per week supervise 50 % time 5. training serve reference control group At termination training period follow-up questionnaire survey
DOC.criteria: office worker employ physically heavy work trauma leif threaten disease , e.g . cancer , pregnancy
